meanings.definition: A substance used to expel intestinal worms.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed vermifuges to help get rid of the worms in my stomach.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often use vermifuges to keep their livestock healthy.
meanings.sent3: The vermifuges worked like magic, making the worms disappear in no time!
meanings.sent4: She sprinkled vermifuges in the soil, watching as the worms wriggled away.
meanings.sent5: The vermifuges were like tiny warriors fighting against the invading worms.

meanings.sent1: I need to vermifuge my pet regularly to ensure it stays healthy.
meanings.sent2: The medication vermifuges the worms, helping the body recover.
meanings.sent3: He vermifuges the garden, making sure the worms don't harm the plants.
meanings.sent4: The vermifuging process was successful in removing the unwanted parasites.
meanings.sent5: She carefully vermifuges the fish tank to prevent any infestations.
